FestivalPlanner.GUI.AgendaGUI

Class AgendaCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestivalPlanner.GUI.AgendaGUI.AgendaCanvas

  • public class AgendaCanvas
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all methods that draw an Agenda to a canvas.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AgendaCanvas

        AgendaCanvas(Agenda agenda,
             AgendaModule agendaModule)
        Constructor of AgendaCanvas.

        Uses the Agenda given as parameter for this.agenda.

        Parameters:
        agenda - sets this.agenda to this object
        agendaModule - the class containing the scene this canvas is connected to

      • AgendaCanvas

        private AgendaCanvas(Agenda agenda,
                     double width,
                     double height,
                     AgendaModule agendaModule)
        Top constructor of AgendaCanvas.

        Last action is calling the draw() method, so the canvas will be drawn after initialising this AgendaCanvas.

        Parameters:
        agenda - the class that contains all the information about the shows.
        width - sets this.canvas.setWidth to this value
        height - sets this.canvas.setHeight to this value
        agendaModule - the class responsible for the gui parts this class will be a part of.

    • Method Detail

      • reBuildAgendaCanvas

        void reBuildAgendaCanvas()
        Builds the AgendaCanvas, and redraws after. See buildAgendaCanvas().

        javafx.scene.Node getMainPane()
        Returns this.mainPane.

        public Agenda getAgenda()

        Returns:

      • setAgenda

        public void setAgenda(Agenda agenda)
        Sets this.agenda to the parameter's value.

        After setting it'll rebuild and redraw this AgendaCanvas

        Parameters:
        agenda - sets this.agenda to this value.

      • getCanvas

        javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas getCanvas()
        Returns this.canvas.
        Returns:
        this.canvas

      • showAtPoint

        @Nullable
Show showAtPoint(java.awt.geom.Point2D point)
        Looks if a Show is displayed at the given Point2D. Returns null when there is no ShowRectangle2D at given Point2D
        Parameters:
        point - The point to check is there is a drawn ShowRectangle2D
        Returns:
        The Show that the ShowRectangle2D at the given Point2D represents.

      • buildAgendaCanvas

        private void buildAgendaCanvas()
        Sets attributes by running the following methods:

        • calculateBounds()
        • calculateUsedStages()
        • showRectanglesToArrayList()

        When an update has been made to this.agenda, this method will make the canvas run the methods mentioned above.

        This method is also called in the constructor of this object and after setting this.agenda. After these actions it is unnecessary to call this method.

      • showRectanglesToArrayList

        private java.util.ArrayList<ShowRectangle2D> showRectanglesToArrayList()
        Creates an ArrayList with a Rectangle2D for every Show.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with all the rectangles from the shows

      • createShowRectangle

        private ShowRectangle2D createShowRectangle(Show show)
        Creates a Rectangle that represents the given show.
        Parameters:
        show - the show that the returned rectangle is based on
        Returns:
        a rectangle, this rectangle isn't shown yet but has a size and location based on the given show

      • calculateBounds

        private void calculateBounds()
        Sets the boundaries of the agendaCanvas.

        It sets these boundaries by initialising this.startX, this.endX, this.startY, this.endY based on the calculated boundaries.

      • calculateUsedStages

        private java.util.ArrayList<Podium> calculateUsedStages()
        Returns a list with all the Stages in this.agenda.

        This method uses a Set to avoid duplicates, and then returns an ArrayList with its contents set to the set's contents.

        Returns:
        an ArrayList with all the used Stages in this.agenda

      • draw

        private void draw(org.jfree.fx.FXGraphics2D graphics)
        Draws everything on this.canvas.
        Parameters:
        graphics - object to be drawn

      • getIntersectArea

        @Nullable
private java.awt.geom.Area getIntersectArea(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D mainRect)
        Checks if the Rectangle2D overlaps any of the other Rectangle2D's.
        Parameters:
        mainRect - the Rectangle2D that will be compared to the other rectangles
        Returns:
        the area where the Rectangle2D overlaps with anothe Rectangle2D if it exists

      • drawTopBar

        private void drawTopBar(org.jfree.fx.FXGraphics2D graphics)
        Draws the time information on the horizontal axis to this.canvas.
        Parameters:
        graphics - object to draw on

      • drawStages

        private void drawStages(org.jfree.fx.FXGraphics2D graphics)
        Draws the lines and names for all stages in this.usedStages.
        Parameters:
        graphics - object to draw on

      • setOnScroll

        private void setOnScroll(javafx.scene.input.ScrollEvent scrollEvent)
        Adds the handlers for ScrollEvent for vertical and horizontal scrolling.
        Parameters:
        scrollEvent - the eventHandler (instance of ScrollEvent) for scrolling

      • cameraInBounds

        private boolean cameraInBounds(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform)
        Calculates if the given translate will fit within the set bounds, and then returns false and true dependent on the result.

        Currently only works on translations, scale not implemented YET.

        Parameters:
        transform - AffineTransform that is proposed
        Returns:
        true if the given translate is in bounds
